original_text: Now there was a day when the sons of God came to present themselves before the Lord, and Satan also came among them.
korean_text: 하루는 하나님의 아들들이 와서 여호와 앞에 섰고 사탄도 그들 가운데에 온지라

sentences.original_text: when the sons of God came to present themselves before the Lord
and Satan also came among them.
